description: Second floor rear extension; replacement of main entrance door; alterations to front garden boundary wall and hardstanding area including widening of vehicular crossover and dropped kerb
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

33TRL/A001 Revision 03 (Site Location & Block Plan); 33TRL/A001 (Existing and Proposed Floor Plans); 33TRL/A003 (Existing and Proposed Roof Plans); 33TRL/A004 (Existing and Proposed Elevations); 33TRL/A005 (Existing and Proposed Side Elevations); 33TRL/A006 Revision 03 (Existing and Proposed Site Layout Plan); Door Specifications Sheet
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development hereby approved shall be as per those described in the submitted application form and plans listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
